title: Bacteria play a central biological role

content.question: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. Bacteria play central biological roles. (a) Bacteria may act as producers parasites mutualistic symbionts decomposers Select THREE of the ecological roles above. For each one you choose, describe how bacteria carry out the role and discuss its ecological importance.

frqParts.text: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. Bacteria play central biological roles. (a) Bacteria may act as producers parasites mutualistic symbionts decomposers Select THREE of the ecological roles above. For each one you choose, describe how bacteria carry out the role and discuss its ecological importance.
(b) Explain how bacteria can be altered to make genetically engineered products.
